ComicInfo.Series: My Little Pony: Set Your Sail
ComicInfo.Summary: Ah, another beautiful day in the Sparkling Sea -krrzzhh- Ahoy there, squids and scoundrels! Pull up a clamshell and listen to our tale of captured princ-krrzzhh-Ahem, sorry about that, everypony. It seems our solicit was interrupted by some sort of pirate radio signal... Whoever that was definitely wasn't going to say anything about a captured princess. Nope. Everything is toootally fine under the Sparkling Sea. Princess Pipp Petals is on a super-standard diplomatic mission, and any meddling princess sisters do not need to worry about her whereabouts or the crumbling coral around the palace. Please enjoy this completely not suspicious comic!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-08 05:06:23. [CVDB1062149]
ComicInfo.Characters: Cloudpuff, Hitch Trailblazer, Izzy Moonbow, Misty Brightdawn, Pipp Petals, Queen Haven, Sparky Sparkeroni, Sunny Starscout, Zipp Storm
ComicInfo.Teams: Earth Ponies, Mane 5, Seaponies, Unicorns, Winged Steeds
